abstract: HSBC’s U.S. securities division will no longer extend structured financing to hedge-fund investors to leverage their investments.
snippet: HSBC’s U.S. securities division will no longer extend structured financing to hedge-fund investors to leverage their investments.
lead_paragraph: HSBC‘s securities division in the United States will no longer extend structured financing to hedge fund investors to leverage their investments, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: HSBC Said to Cut Off Leverage for Hedge Fund Investors
